Package jparsec.io.image

Provides support for fits and raw image, as well as methods to draw or deal with images.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Base64Coder
    A Base64 encoder/decoder.
    Draw
    Draw provides a basic capability for creating drawings.
    FitsBinaryTable
    A class to manipulate binary tables in .fits files.
    FitsIO
    A class to read and write .fits files.
    ImageHeaderElement
    A class to manage image headers.
    ImageSplineTransform
    Spline interpolation in 2D applied to rotate or resample images, based on two different routines by Philippe Thévenaz and A.
    Picture
    A class to read, write, and process images.
    Resize
    Advanced image/2d array resize method based on the image resize plugin at http://bigwww.epfl.ch/algorithms/ijplugins/resize/, implementing the method by A.
    WCS
    The World Coordinates System (WCS) describes the coordinates of the image.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FitsBinaryTable.COLUMN_FORMAT
    The set of different data types.
    FitsIO.PICTURE_LEVEL
    The set of options to obtain the picture of a fits file.
    Picture.FORMAT
    The set of image formats.
    Picture.RGB
    The RGB components.
    WCS.PROJECTION
    The set of possible projections.

Package jparsec.io.image Description

Provides support for fits and raw image, as well as methods to draw or deal with images.

This package contains classes to read and write .fits and raw images, including access to metadata or headers. Images can be visualized or created using Java2D methods with easy.
